name: VR PHYSICS GRAVITY CONCEPT ON DIFFERENT PLANETS
summary: VR Gravity Lab is an immersive physics learning application built using Unity, designed to help students understand gravity concepts through real-time interaction. Learners can explore planetary environments such as Earth, Moon, and Mars, perform hands-on experiments, and observe how gravity affects motion and objects. By combining interactive simulations with visual feedback, the platform makes complex gravity concepts engaging, intuitive, and easy to understand for educational use.
